replies.body: Nunu & Willump absolutely melt my heart and I can't wait to see what Riot do.

A lot of discussion has been around "oh he is too cute to be an angry monster", but just look at his design. 
A mouth big enough to bit a man in two, antlers so you know its gonna head-but hard and six limbs each with 3 claws that I'd imagine are pretty strong.

That's one hell of a beast.

it's not that he isn't still a monster, it's just that he looks alot friendlier than he did, which Nunu mains don't like because they're already a bit memey and the fact that Nunu looked mildly intimidating was one of the ways they felt better when playing him.

Do remember that this isn't something that was meant to be published, it's entirely possible the design has changed or will change (though unlikely drastically) in the time leading up to his release.

It's also without any form of context. While it seems likely this is his base skin it doesn't have to be. It could be that this pose is from his joke and his overall feel is less goofy. It could be part of his lore and like how Nunu sees him but not how he actually is. You get the idea. We can speculate sure, but we're missing so much info here.

EDIT: I'd recommend reading the bio now that it's out :)

its very "zoe-style". Like kid-friendly kind of route to take the champ. Doesn't seem to fit league imo, but then again the new Akali is very anime, so they are definitely changing the way they want the game to look.

But looking at the size of his mouth, I think his "Consume" animation could be quite funny.
